A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it! I don't understand the hate behind this film. Simple and easy to follow plot\, new fun characters and further developed existing ones. Not everything landed but no film is perfect and I understand the reasoning behind some of the decisions made. Furthered the mythos\, call backs to prequels in an interesting way. Interesting take on Luke which I was a fan of. So many directions Ep.9 can go in and I can't wait to see where they take it next.
